    • Constructor Detail

      • MockBot

        public MockBot​(java.lang.String name,
               double fakeEnergy,
               double fakeHeading,
               double fakePosX,
               double fakePosY)
        Construct a mock robot to be used as a substitute for BasicMeleeBot in unit testing. It overrides calls to robocode's advanced robot class to prevent robocode's exceptions from being thrown. Also it allows for an easy way to setup a robot for testing and to verify the output of classes that modify the robot's state.

        The robot is setup using the input arguments. The gun starts with the same heading as the robot. The current implementation only overrides the methods used by ETSA02's BasicMeleeBot.
        Parameters:
        name -
        fakeEnergy -
        fakeHeading -
        fakePosX -
        fakePosY -
